original_text:
May they be like chaff before the wind,
    with the angel of the Lord driving them away;
korean_text: 그들을 바람 앞에 겨와 같게 하시고 여호와의 천사가 그들을 몰아내게 하소서

sentences.original_text: May they be like chaff before the wind
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 바람 앞의 검과 같게 되기를

sentences.original_text: with the angel of the Lord driving them away
